A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For so long\, elevated and held captive by Star Wars\, I'm still reeling from an series which has unexpectedly turned on me\, as if a dear friend had always been pretending to be someone else. A vast pond of shallow depths\, The Last Jedi spends its precious time throwing darts at corny humor during its most critical moments for potential growth. I left feeling stunningly uninspired and helplessly betrayed\, and wondering if who I've always thought I was\, is who I've always been\, and if it's still who I am now.
